attributes.action: Clearly condem the recent imposition of a state of emergency in Pakistan and to suspend UK aid and other forms of support until the normal rule of law is re-introduced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The announcement of a state of emergency by General Musharraf is not about any extremist threat, but is a calculated attempt to avoid free and fair elections.

The UK must not support dictatorship in any country, as this only breeds extremism. We must not use the 'war on terror' as an excuse to do the wrong thing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
